channel.title: [PI]Lunar problem[PI]
channel.description: Hi.. Every time I log on my server and go over to the lunar altar thing and click it.. it works fine and it says "A lunar wisdom fills your mind" but then when I click my mage book my click freezes and in the cmd it says:[code]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8277) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1896) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8152) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] Does anyone know how to fix this? I think it is server sided.. Please help!

item.title: [PI]Lunar problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Actually… The problem is client sided because I just tried to use a different client and it worked. I can’t use that other client because it has sooooo many errors… so I need to fix this.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Hmm… If I were to try to find the lunar interface in the server what would I search? I have a program called agent ransack where I can search all the files at once so I don’t really need to know what file to search… Just what to search.

item.title: [PI]Lunar problem[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Hi… Every time I log on my server and go over to the lunar altar thing and click it… it works fine and it says “A lunar wisdom fills your mind” but then when I click my mage book my click freezes and in the cmd it says:Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8277) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1896) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8152) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Does anyone know how to fix this? I think it is server sided… Please help!

Read full topic
